settings.editor: Make money selling your films and series directly online to a worldwide audience. Set your own price and take home 90% of the revenue after transaction costs. Earn Money from Online Videos.

tabs.tab_title: What's The Easiest Way to Make Money Online?
tabs.tab_content: Make sure that it is at least 60% video and that the "homework" is digestable and created like a curriculum. Remember, once its packaged and created, the only thing left to do is market it. Create A/B tests on ads and webinars and find the best cost per click and cost per acquisition. You'll get better at targeting the right user and where they hangout.

tabs.tab_title: What Online Business Can I do Make Money?
tabs.tab_content: Teachable is a great way to keep your brand and pay affiliates to sell your program, and udemy is great for traffic as they generate a few million users per month. So i suggest uploading to both.

tabs.tab_title: How Can I Make Money Selling Information Oniline?
tabs.tab_content: With everything already packaged, you can walk people through the system on the phone monthly or biweekly. You can create a group coaching program and do it over a conference line to hundreds or thousands of people monthly.

settings.editor:
There are many different ways to compile this and make money and a name for yourself. First step is to make sure that you are clear on who it helps and why. Just because it is high quality does not mean that it is effective. 

Personally, I would do a mixed version of coaching and online school. Create the program by doing a group coaching model and then once its all recorded and sequenced, simply upload the trainings for a "hands off" approach to the same thing. Now you can cater to those who want the personal touches.
